title: Cannot unlock pixel 3a
content:
My phone keeps asking for PIN in a loop. I just can't use my phone anymore. 
This started on 19th March 2020. Still not resolved. 
I seriously don't want to do a factory reset. 
Is there any other way to deal with this?
My phone has become unusable from the past 14-15 days.

Cannot see any acceptable solution to this issue in the forums.

Note - The PIN entered is correct. Whenever I enter a wrong PIN, I see 'Incorrect PIN' message.
